name: Bowerbuild
description:
game to get me acquainted with unity 2d!!

Bring items back to your nest!!

WASD - move

Space - interact

LShift - Run

p.s. if the ui/inventory looks off trying zooming in or out in your browser

its probably some setting somewhere but i don't want to rebuild this rn : )

probably has something to do with this. https://forum.unity.com/threads/zooming-in-on-browser-resizes-and-moves-some-ui-...

things learned:

  • prefabs exist for a reason
  • i dont like pixel art
  • i can't do math

things to add maybe:

  • destroy the pixel art and just paint everything
  • more items
  • beating other bowerbirds into submission to collect their items
  • actual title and end screens
